page.title: 06HACKLINGE AREA INDUSTRY
page.content: {Betteshanger Mine}is the main industry in the area. Nine thousand tons of prime coking coal are extracted each week and are transported by rail and road to Power Stations and Industry. There are forty miles of pit shafts, the deepest being 1900ft. Most of the machinery is controlled by computers. {Model Flight Accessories}manufacture radio-controlled aeroplanes and boats with their various accessories. The products are sold all over Gt.Britain, as well as being exported. {Worth Packers}is a vegetable packing station who sell to Sainsburys, a large super-market chain. The vege- tables are all grown in the area. {Northbourne Tractors}repair and sell farm machinery.
